website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung HW-Q70R is a Dolby Atmos soundbar with wonderfully enveloping sound for movies, but music lovers should look elsewhere.
pros: For a single speaker, the Samsung HW-Q70R offers excellent faux-surround effects, and the wireless subwoofer packs a punch
It supports both Dolby Atmos and DTS:X, plus pass-through 4K HDR video
The system is attractive and well built
cons: Not all that convincing with music
The speaker lacks features found on cheaper rivals, including a voice assistant or Google Chromecast streaming

customer_reviews.title: Get the surround extra speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Could be a tad louder. It’s loud but not hair band loud.The Bluetooth works unbelievable. Very smart. Now after having it a few days. The sound will give you shivers. It sounds like you are at a live concert. I would give it 100 stars. Unbelievable is all can say.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Powerful Replacement for Legacy Audio System
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about the loss in sound quality when replacing a high-end Pioneer Elite amp and JBL tower speakers, but this was completely unfounded. Clarity and volume is superb and the design is unobtrusive. Thrilled! I also added the Samsung SWA-8500S surround speakers. Setup was a breeze with my new Samsung Q70R TV. Just follow the setup instructions. I opted to use just the HDMI ARC connection, and everything is working great.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: Thx Samsung for this beautiful sound system. Dolby Atmos is amazing. Easy to use everything controlled by app. But i found small scratch in my subwoofer maybe from shipping ;( Note: when i connect the satellite box to soundbar hdmi, I found that my satellite box switched off when i change the channel from Dolby channel to stereo so I fixed that by connecting satellite box to TV hdmi and then ARC hdmi from soundbar to TV ARC.
customer_reviews.author: YOUSEF A.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, reliable syncing, love it
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound bar. I wavered over 5.1 vs. this 7.1, and I am glad we went with this 7.1. The sound is theater quality, and the satellite speakers really add to the experience. A lot depends on your room configuration, so YMMV. The initial wireless sync was seamless with no hiccups since. Just turn on the TV and you are in business. The morning system could be more flexible. The bar itself is pretty heavy, so you need to mount it in studs. Combined with the 82" Samsung Q80R TV, this sound bar provides a theater-like experience in the comfortable if your living room.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mattes

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SOUND!!!
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with a Q80 82” TV. Match made in Heaven. This sound bar is top notch! I have only had it up to 82, its freakin LOUD!!! Even at 82 it was clear, the sub is clean. The surround features built in have had me looking around my living room for things that aren’t there. I also purchased the “wireless” surround speakers. Impulse while walking through a brick and mortar store that rhymes with test fly. They aren’t wireless. You have to run speaker wires to the surrounds. Haven’t done that yet. But... Yeah. This sound bar is AMAZING!!! From deep cinematic movies, to bright highs from music. I do not regret this purchase at all! #noragrets
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Unfixable Sound Delay with Samsung TV - - Read before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung 55" Class MU6300 4K UHD TV, so I purchased this sound bar, thinking that buying two products from the same brand would mean automatic compatability. That is not the case. This sound bar will only sync sound properly in Dolby Digital mode with the newest, Q series Samsung TVs. Other tvs will have to be switched to stereo, defeating the purpose of buying a high-end soundbar. I'm utterly disappointed, and expected better from Samsung. I'm now stuck choosing between inferior sound or a small delay between the image and the audio. Might as well have bought a cheaper soundbar from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as 5 year old Vizio
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely did not work for me. Side by side comparison to my 5 year old VIZIO S5451w-C2 54-Inch 5.1 Channel Sound Bar with Subwoofer and Surrounds (2014 Model) . Dialog "enhancement" was NOT nearly as good as the Vizio. In fact, dialog dropped to whisper whenever "background" noises stopped. No amount of adjustments would correct this. The Vizio has much sharper and louder dialog. As far as "surround" goes, both units work about the same. So, no improvement with the Samsung means I'm sending it back. Comparison was run with a 5 year old Sony 3d television, Roku Ultra, and a 5 year old Sony 3D blue ray player.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Q60R Irritating A.F.
customer_reviews.text: 2019 Oct 1st - The Q60R system is counter-productive when listening to music for relaxation purposes. This up and down, on and off sound quality bullcrap is irritating A.F. I paid over $400 to be disappointed with the Samsung Q60R 5.1 soundbar and woofer. The sound blinks often while watching movies and while streaming music, and in between blinks the treble/bass balance changes on its own as if it goes from full sound to partial sound, again and again, then the sound pauses for a second in time, then resumes, all on its own. No sound consistency at all. So glad I held on to the box, since receiving it one week ago.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT work with older Samsung Televisions
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar will NOT work with the older (2015/2016) UHD Samsung televisions. Model: UN65JS9000, specifically. Two hours on the phone with Samsung tech support, a manual software update for the TV and the support guy finally said, "this sounder might not be for you."
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: My LG outperforms this sound bar and at half the price. There is hardly any Bass produced from the subwoofer. Very dissatisfied with this purchase. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Samsung Sound bar is a mixed bag  of tricks.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and sturdy. Easy setup. BUT if used in any other mode other than "standard" there is a terrible "LAG" between the video and voices. You see lips moving, then LAG and than sound. The LAG can not be corrected using the SYNC control. while the sound bar sounds good in Standard mode, it becomes a very over-priced speaker. Samsung has better come up with a fix for this or it's being returned. Wasted my time with Samsung on-line support. No help what so ever. The manual does not explain the proper setup options. Found a few on-line forums with advice on configuring. Found a solution. No more audio lag ( time will tell and I will update)
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: This is a truly a great sound bar from Samsung
customer_reviews.text: I liked this sound bar from Samsung it truly immerses the viewer while watching movies/shows in Dolby Atmos and DTS-X, this sound bar while very bulky (its huge weighs about 20lbs! bar alone) it packs a punch sadly I had to return it. I could not get the bar to connect via wi fi or get the app which both are a must to use the full features of this bar Samsung customer service via my text was awesome help they alone said to return the bar and I got my full price I paid refunded going to buy another Samsung sound bar one of the new 2020's soon, fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: jeffery berg

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Sound
customer_reviews.text: Combined this with the rear speaker kit, and the result is a small home theater with mind blowing sound. Pairs and works with my 2019 gen Samsung 65" TV. Heard a doorbell ring in a movie we watching and my husband got up to answer the door. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Frontier

customer_reviews.title: Absolute joke!!!!
customer_reviews.text: $700.00 dollar sound bar. Samsung / Harman Kardon. Nothing but trouble, tried to get it exchanged and the damn computer said no more in stock. Wonder if there is some inherent problem, so I opted for a full refund, Downhill from there to FULL FUBAR AND SNAFU. (Vets will know) Finally received a call back from China? at 00:34 hours local time, I didn't answer within 10 milliseconds and the caller hung up. I have NO idea what is going to happen next, refund my money is now the top of the no more excuses agenda; I have paid a LOT of money to this organization over the years and I have NEVER bitched, maybe time to start????
customer_reviews.author: CDK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing and inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Got this as I wanted a soundbar for my Samsung Q7 QLED tv, and all the reviews said this was one of the top soundbars. Pros: -Easy to set up -Fits perfectly under the tv -when it works, it’s better than standard tv Cons: -the sound cuts in and out regularly regardless of setting -you constantly have to reset it by turning the bar off and on I would NOT recommend this as it’s been more disappointing than good.
customer_reviews.author: Hooey

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect sounds bar to go with your Samsung QLED tv. When connected using the ARC HDMI connection you can control the volume using the TV remote. It automatically adjusts for game mode. It does not have standard holes in the back for mounting though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Often loses voice-to-lip-movement sync
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are great in general. The system really does make voices easier to understand when the volume is turned down (vs. the speakers in the Q-90 tv) But occasionally I'll notice that lips are moving out of sync with the sound track, then it will go away. I've tried wifi, optical, and bluetooth. It seems to happen least with wifi, and in wifi sync is adjustable...but as I mentioned it's not there all the time...annoying. Perhaps a software update will fix it, but the owner's manual indicates that it will auto-update in wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Sound Quality for a 5.1
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a decent sound bars with quality sound. I own a Bose sound touch 5.1 system, which was performing poor recently. I had to upgrade and found this Sound Bar with decent reviews. Packaging was pretty good and easy to open and set up the sound bar. It is as simple as 3 steps. I also bought the wireless speakers to pair them up with this sound bar. Once its on , you are in a Theater. I have a Samsung 75inch Smart Tv and this paired up really good. I would recommend this Sound Bar.
customer_reviews.author: aguynamed

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere and save some money
customer_reviews.text: My first review was more positive than this one. After using this sound at got about 6 weeks, I have to give it a lower score. For most sources like tv and movies, it sounds good, but just good. Nothing much stands out except this sound bar is difficult to adjust. This thing also changes adjustments by itself depending on the sound mode you are using. I am using a 65 inch Samsung TV with this soundbar, not much advantage to that. Sometimes it works, sometimes you have to go through the setup again. Finally, the wireless surround speakers are also difficult to set up.in addition, much of the time, you can’t tell if they are doing anything at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to pair with my new Samsung 75" Q60R QLED TV...and I'm glad I did. It pairs seamlessly with the TV, and by using the ARC HDMI input, it turns on when the TV is turned on and I cna control the volume with my main Samsung remote, which is great. This looks great and for the money, it sounds fantastic. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Teri 's fire

customer_reviews.title: 2 extra speakers sound very weak.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality sound of the speaker and I don't know why 2x extra speakers really sound very weak. I wi keep trying for the next 2 days, it not I will ask for a replacement since I have paid $1,600 tax included and cannot tolerate for this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Luong

customer_reviews.title: ARC Issues with Vizio TV
customer_reviews.text: When this worked, it was amazing! However, the ARC connection with our Vizio TV was problematic with periodic dropouts. With the PCM setting on the TV, it would only be sound drops, but the audio quality suffered. With the Bitstream setting, audio was incredible but the audio and video would drop out. We initially bought a "renewed" version. We thought it may be broken, so we returned and got a new one. They both had the same issue. We have since discovered that there is not a strong control of the ARC interface and they can vary between manufacturers. We have a Vizio D series TV which apparently doesn't play well with Samsung ARC
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Michelle

customer_reviews.title: No bass - terrible sound
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I'm a huge Samsung fan! I have 3 Samsung TVs and their latest phone which are all great! I even bought a Samsung oven and fridge! However, this soundbar has horrible sound! I'm sending it back. You can hear the bass just a little with it all the way up. I am having a hard time believing the other reviewers. Do people not know what good sound is? Are they just settling for what they can get? The speakers in my Samsung TV sound exactly the same as this soundbar - there is really no difference. The $50 Logitech speakers on my desk sound better than this soundbar. Come on Samsung, you can do better!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy and Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write reviews, but the sound quality on this Samsung soundbar, is beyond amazing and impressive. if you are on the fence about spending a little bit more money, I would encourage you to go for it and you will have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but shuts down at times
customer_reviews.text: Great sound; however, periodically, the sound bar "shuts down" and has to be re-installed.
customer_reviews.author: alease s. copelin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing center channel, overall solid sound
customer_reviews.text: At this price point with no ability to adjust the center channel volume is a fail. They tout the adaptive sound, but it is nothing more than a gimmick when all they needed to do is provide manual control. So I am back to the pain of constantly adjusting the volume when watching a movie. I wrote this specifically for those focused on the benefits of a dedicated center channel, because this is not it. From an overall sound quality however, this thing rocks! The Bluetooth connectivity is nice, bass is great. But I was sold on the dedicated center channel, and there are many less expensive competitors out there that provide far more control over the sound distribution.
customer_reviews.author: TV16

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and Money
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great when the device works. The devise continuously shuts off in the middle of a movie, or often requires me to unplug all connections to reset the device. Currently, I have my Roku, and XBox one X connected to the sound bar. The sound bar is connected from the ARC support outlet on the TV. Often, I don’t feel like hassling with the sound bar, and find myself reading a book. I would not recommend anyone purchasing the device unless you’re interested in awaiting time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rear speakers don't work properly
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great with the soundbar and the woofer but when it comes down to the rear speakers for some inexplicable reason they don't synchronize 100% the rear speakers are a very low and no matter how much Tech Support, they came with the USB firmware update but the updates but doesn't work......NOW WHAT????
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Perez

customer_reviews.title: Not plug and play in my experience.
customer_reviews.text: Final update: Called support tele #. Talked to “Jerome”. Told me how to reset soundbar. It works fine now. Hold the - and + down together until the soundbar displays “OK“. It now sounds very good. I will leave the rest of the review up here. Should have worked correctly right out of the box. New Samsung TV. Digital channels sound great. Analog sound horrible. HDMI or optical cable have muffled and choked sound on old streaming movies or analog over the air. Tried different cables, reset, restart. Still sounds awful. Thought I’d save money v Bose. Sorry I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: There is no eARC Support so you don't get Dolby Atmos
customer_reviews.text: Samsung failed to provide an eARC firmware update to provide Dolby Atmos. Avoid this if you can because the 2020 models seem to support since those probably get hdmi 2.1
customer_reviews.author: Sundeep B

customer_reviews.title: Almost great.
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this over the much cheaper Q80R, because it seems the only thing you're getting here for the ~$750 price difference are the satellite speakers which are currently nearly useless. The satellite speakers are so quiet regardless of any setting, you can't hear them. Even with the "boost" set to the max of +6. If they added in an option to further boost the volume of the satellite speakers independently from the main soundbar, this may be fixed. Firmware updates apparently fixed the subwoofer issue, so maybe in the future they will fix these as well. Perhaps these were designed for small rooms where the satellite speakers are much closer to the listener.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IMPOSSIBLE TO SET UP FOR NON-TECH SAVVY PEOPLE
customer_reviews.text: First off, please don't judge the quality of this product on this review. The problem, I think, lies with us, not the unit. First we couldn't get it synced with our universal remote, then the sound bar remote would only work once in a while. If you are not really tech savvy, the instructions that come with this unit might as well be written in a foreign language. Spent several very frustrating hours trying to figure it out and finally gave up. Someone told us the problem might be that our TV is too old. Whatever the problem, it's going back and we're staying with our dinosaur surround sound system.
customer_reviews.author: CFoster

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable sound. Incredible bass.
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar is incredible! The deep rich bass adds so much to the perfect treble that fires out of all the speakers in every direction! I connected the soundbar to my tv using wifi and there is no sync issues at all. Great product with truly amazing sound. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: what a wireless dongle is for
customer_reviews.text: still not sure my rear speakers are hooked up properly. doesn't seem that anyone in India knows what a wireless dongle is and if it even is supposed to be used with my model soundbar since there are no places to attach it that even look like the example in the book. the soundbar itself is incredible even without the rear speakers. If I had to do it over I would have spent the extra money and matched the Q90r soundbar with the Q90r TV
customer_reviews.author: I Corp Vet

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality; works great with my Alexa device and supports WiFi streaming from anything, seemingly.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Leith

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Been thinking about buying a soundbar for a while, and did a lot of research before buying this. So glad I did! Subwoofer is awesome - because you don't normally hear it. It isn't obnoxious or over done. But you'll notice it during a dramatic part of a movie - I swear you'll feel it more than hear it. Starting a movie on Netflix - even the quick Netflix bum-bump is awesome. Literally get excited for the movie just off that feel. Music sounds great, but there is something about movies that are so different with this system. So happy I am now going to invest in the rear speakers too.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound but has a very annoying issue
customer_reviews.text: I am using it with a Samsung TV and a Samsung remote. The sound quality is good although a bit lacking on the sub-bass section. It is connected via digital in (“D.IN”). The frustrating issue is that once in a while the TV remote cannot control the soundbar volume anymore (even if the TV shows it as the current sound output device), until I press the input-select button on the soundbar and cycle to the same position (i.e. “D.IN” again). Probably a firmware bug that Samsung should definitely fix as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: DDT

customer_reviews.title: Great for TV & Gaming!
customer_reviews.text: The wireless surround speakers are fantastic and add true surround sound capabilities for gaming and watching TV. However, if it's for music you are better off with something else, hence the four stars. I find it hard to tell if the sound is much clearer than the TV speakers. But crank it up to medium volume and the extremely clear highs and earth-shaking bass come alive, really awesome! A huge plus for me was the ease of setting this up. I’m not very savvy with cables, wires and all but this really was idiot-proof. For the price, don't think you can go wrong with this system.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne carlin

customer_reviews.title: Sound is awesome - just delayed
customer_reviews.text: The sound is incredible. If you can get the lips to synch definitely buy it. I am returning it. I tried with techs on the phone repeatedly to get the lips to synch but it wouldn't do it. I have a Samsung TV which it should work well with but it didn't. Too bad - the sound is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Boom Boom

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I was deciding Q90R with Bose Soundbar 700 with Sub and finally ended up with Q90R. I had both bought and working at home for 1 week at same time and compared what they can deliver. Bose is good in clarity but when it comes to movie experience Q90R wins all the way with providing theater effect at low levels(i mean night watch with low volume). Bose is good for music and its surround is amazing compared to what Q90R provides with 4 units Vs Bose 2 units.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Can't connect to internet.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with all newer TVs. I have a beautiful newer 65" Samsung Curved screen but it doesn't have Bluetooth so it couldn't connect to the sound bar and therefore connect the sound system to the internet. The sound is very good especially the clarity of dialog but the usefulness is reduced because of the lack of connection to internet. Customer service was unaware of the situation, took several contacts to realize I was out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Insurance Agent

customer_reviews.title: Just to know the sound can be achieved in such a small size!!DKELLY DDS
customer_reviews.text: I recently had the Geek Squad install the Samsung sound bar Q80R on my new purchase Samsung Ultra HD 82” H70c TV I & WOW! It should be mandatory for purchasing one requires the other because the sound quality is indescribable ( also added rear samsung speakers as well). Has sound technology made advances lately without requiring enormous size to achieve the same . I love music (mostly classical & serious pop) & this combination is FABULOUS. If you do this purchase, my recommendation is to have Geek Squad (or equivalent) install to taylor the system to your liking (i.e.volume f/r - bass/treble - surround etc). Costly?Yes but life’s too short.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, clear sound, easy installation, and software linking to the TV remote.
customer_reviews.text: Samsung does it again! The sound quality is fabulous. In our small living room it sounds like we’re in the stadium, movie theater, or concert hall. Equalizer adjustments for hearing loss in the high frequencies worked very well for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: LightPixie

customer_reviews.title: An excellent sound-bar, surround sound not so much
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sound bar, a HUGE upgrade over the TV speakers. The subwoofer is room-shaking without sounding boom-y. The center dialog speakers are great and provide clear speech. BUT it's no substitute for an actual 5.1 system. To my ears the sound modes that simulate surround just sound echo-y and fake. I think it sounds best with the center channel boosted slightly and the left and right channels set to -1. My room (and wife) wouldn't tolerate actual rear speakers, so I knew I couldn't get real surround sound, but this gives me what I need, loud, accurate reproduction with a full frequency response. But don't expect it to sound even remotely like an real 5.1 system.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad at all.
customer_reviews.text: When I read the reviews I was a little apprehensive with the mixed reviews. But i honestly can say this is not bad for the money. Sound quality is really good and subwoofer puts out some nice bass. I would definitely recommend this if you are on a budget. Atmos works great when you watch the right movie's. Hook up with the Samsung TV was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Fontanez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound ruined by poor connectivity between speakers
customer_reviews.text: The good; These are the richest sounding speakers I've ever owned. eARC is well appreciated. Setup is easy. Dolby content really sticks out. Speakers consistently have connectivity issues. I have updated as requested by tech support. No longer looses connection but will have random rumbles at the subwoofer. Almost sounds like rapid pounding on a wall even low volume. Rear speakers have a scratchy sound with often cut outs. My set up is a maximum distance of around 14 feet from the soundbar. Keep that in mind. I do not currently recommend this product unless these issues are resolved.
customer_reviews.author: bl

customer_reviews.title: Great surround sound
customer_reviews.text: Mine was sold by Walts, who shipped unit via FedEx the day I ordered. Package is very very heavy. Set up was easy. Sound is awesome. Edit: It also plays music beautifully. Pairs well with my Vizio tv. Harmony remote works well with this set up. I compensated for low rear speakers by turning front speakers down. You can go from -6 to +6 on all speakers. Make sure your tv stand is wide/deep enough for the feet of your tv and the soundbar. Ours wasn’t, but we wanted a new stand anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: I love this soundbar. It produces fantastic sound and gives a lot of flexibility with sound mode and adjustments to each speaker level. Setup was extremely easy and once software is updated it's continually updated simply by being connected to the internet. I'd been buying Bose Soundtouch bars but I like this one even better. It does seem to compliment my Samsung QLED 4k TV extremely well!!
customer_reviews.author: Glen Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great sound system, but terrible customer support
customer_reviews.text: Works and sounds great. Called customer support with questions and they had no clue. Just listens for key words, goes to the script and their listening to the customer stops and they just read from script, that may or may not be answer to the question. Very disappointed in Samsung Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: Crazyhorse

customer_reviews.title: Glad to see Samsung didn't degrade the HK experience but instead enhanced it.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy configuration, I was actually expecting it to be cumbersome and was very happily surprised. Great sound. Piece of advice, skim through the entire manual before starting the setup. The manual isn't long and easy to skim through. Harman Kardon have always made good sounding equipment but not always cutting edge from technology advancements, Samsung's integration send to have really added new levels to the HK sounds experience with simplified configuration. The intuitive nature of source detection is wonderful and totally didn't anticipate it detection and switching to a newly activated device. A nice enhancement from an older wired 5.1 system to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your tv has an eARC input or don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new tv for the Soundbar to work as designed. I had a 8 yr old Samsung flat screen but it didn’t have the eARC input for the Soundbar. I had to spend $2000 for a new, same size Samsung flat screen that supported Dolby Atmos via eARC. Of course, once I had all the newest, latest and greatest it works beautifully however I didn’t want to have to spend so much in a new tv just to get the sound to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, sounds great
customer_reviews.text: 2019 70in samsung tv and the soundbar fits perfectly between the legs. Before I could barely hear any dialogue from the TV. Now I can hear clearly. Never set up a soundbar before and it was really easy. The wireless (just need to plug into outlet for power) subwoofer is paired with the soundbar already and it is as easy as plugging in. The soundbar works automatically with my tv remote so one remote. I used an HDMI cable to connect to tv which I had to buy seperately. I love the sound, the ease of installation, and the fact I only need one remote.
customer_reviews.author: Twopitbulls

customer_reviews.title: Q60R Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Q60R Soundbar to interface with my new Samsung Q900. Poor setup sheet instructions. No manual available to download from Samsung.com Soundboard sound not clear and sharp. Did not enhance the regular TV speaker sound of the Samsung Q900 TV Not worth the added cost of this Soundbar. For On/Off power, don't understand why one Samsung remote control cannot be used to control both TV & Soundbar. However, both Remotes, control volume.
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: Wow....
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the depth and richness of sound - perfect addition to make movies that much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound after tricky update
customer_reviews.text: I love this soundbar. The love the immersion for both movies and games. I actually prefer playing shooting games without my headphones now because of the surround sound with this. It took a minute to figure out how to update the subwoofer and rear speakers (they don't automatically update with the soundbar) but after an internet search I was able to get that done and I have loved it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand where all the negative reviews come from. This bar is freakin awesome. Loud bass, loud sound, it has 13 speakers that u can adjust volumes on all. A d easy set up
customer_reviews.author: sweet_chocolate

customer_reviews.title: It's great yet have to set it up properly.
customer_reviews.text: Did the update paid attention in getting the sound just the way I wanted. It sounds great once you connect to TV arc which requires hdmi and your TV has to support it. The surround sound throws the sound all around you. It can throw you off thinking that the sound in the rear is either in the house or part of a movie. Be careful while playing Call of duty or any game with expulsion. My God the sound is crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Jpennie

customer_reviews.title: Liking it so far—week old purchase
customer_reviews.text: Only have had it a week, so we’re still in the honeymoon period. 5 stars for the simple setup. Took a star away for sync issues. I’m using the ARC from a q90r tv to the sound bar. Saw somewhere online that eARC is supposed to solve that and it would be a firmware upgrade sometime this summer. The sync issue is more pronounced when I use my antenna than from internet delivered content. The sound is really good and the bass has a great timber to it. No regrets so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sqynt

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Soundbar play static when powered on and off. Sound quality was intermittent, sometimes good and sometimes awful. Called Samsung support twice and got no help what so ever. Told me to move my cable 4 to 6 ft away from the soundbar. Their reason was that my cable box was introducing static into the soundbar. That is ridiculous as the soundbar sitting underneath a 55 inch television screen which produces a lot of static.
customer_reviews.author: David Bortle

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar. If you are looking for a subwoofer that will rattle their neighbors windows... this is not the one. If you want great balanced sound, this is the one. It has plenty of bass and perfectly balanced to not overwhelm or drown out good sound. If you have a Samsung TV it’s plug and play. Auto discovered and set itself up. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Good soundbar for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for the price, I have not tried the q70 but the addition of Atmos and Dolby x and plus would be a great addition. Sound is good and voices are clear. For those of you having issues with ARC you need to have an ARC compliant HDMI cable. Not all cables are created equal and using a crappy cable will yield unfavorable results.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: mostly a solid system
customer_reviews.text: The box did not survive shipping all that well. Everything inside arrived undamaged though and works great. Set up is literally just plug it in. The app for the phone is easier to use than the remote that's included so I'd recommend that in place of the remote. The sound is very good for the money and I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Williams

customer_reviews.title: A must have if available!
customer_reviews.text: Simple set-up. Three connections in the correct order and you’re up and running in two minutes. I paired it to a Samsung QLED 7 series TV using the digital cable. Sound is awesome via a Blue Ray player and impressive via a cable provider. I couldn’t rate Tech Support as none was needed it was so easy.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my living room for sound with a large TV. It was easy to install and works very well. I am satisfied. I did stay with a same brand as my TV to minimize any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynne Mesimer

customer_reviews.title: Buy expensive items from Costco!!  Amazon does not price protect.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon reduced price by $150 6 days after I bought it. No price protection. I have to uninstall, return and buy again for product I basically liked. Remote did not work but Samsung is sending new one. Sound ok not great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Best theatre sound I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this system. I had to turn the subwoofer down. The quality of sound is fantastic. I am not even using my Senheiser headphones anymore. The voices are pristine. The surround sound is very realistic.
customer_reviews.author: aaus10

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality from this beautiful Samsung product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one heck of a soundbar. The sound quality in incredible! I can hear all the sound details in my 4K videos. It also perfectly syncs to all my streaming movies without skipping a beat. This is definitely a top of the line soundbar. Please be aware that it is bigger than the average soundbar. It complements our 65 inch TV perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice soundbar
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sound bar. Excellent sound quality. The only issue I have with it, is that it is difficult to find a compromise between the speaking volume and the action. If I turn it up high enough to be able to understand what is being said, it will blast the house on action scenes. I have found that this is an issue with most surround sound systems. (My wife hates it). I just keep the remote handy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul V. Wyss

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is the sweet spot of sound bars. Easy to connect and incredible sound for both music and movies. ARC connection to LG OLED works as advertised and 4K HDMI pass through from my PC is perfect. This bar and sub will fill your room with beautiful, clear, crisp and powerful sound.
customer_reviews.author: tothv

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great...Paired perfectly with Samsung 65" Q60R TV.  Both work on same remote
customer_reviews.text: Paired with a Samsung Q60R TV. Easy to connect and turns on with TV or Cable remote as well as volume control without having to use different remote. Like it because any time a had a separate sound bar, I needed another remote. Sound is great with the included subwoofer. Also, love that I can easily pair my phone to play music.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install. rich sound.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first of 2 soundbars I plan to purchase this year. This unit was very easy to mount on my wall and connect to my 6 year old Samsung TV. The sound is very rich and realistic. The base connects effortlessly and it too provides a deep rich sound that is adjustable. My only knock is the same for all surround sound systems. there is no sound leveling when you switch from TV programs to commercials. You constantly have to adjust the sound level. However, I am a happy customer and will be purchasing the second one soon.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: Soundbar is extremely loud! We had to turn it down to have a conversation with our friends while watching the game. Crystal Clear, great acoustics, great bass. I would highly recommend to someone wanting to add surround sound to their room without having a group of small speakers. The options to fine tune the sound to your liking is also a perk. Extremely happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Clockwork

customer_reviews.title: Great value product for $900
customer_reviews.text: Not really "surround sound" but decent sound output and fills the family room. A good investment for everyday use. The auto switch-on from the TV through hdmi eARC stopped working after a few weeks and it defaults to TV Speaker when we turn the TV on, and we need to go into settings and change it every time. Have not yet contacted tech support though.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jain

customer_reviews.title: I bought two so far
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed by this. I did buy two of them on sale for 277 so far. I bought one for my dad and he loves it and one for my bedroom. It sounds fantastic. I am debating buying a third for the living room but have not yet convinced myself of it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Well done sound and compatibility is great.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Deep bass. Full sound in my small bonus room above 3 car garage ( just explaining size ). Added the additional read speakers to make it 5.1.2. Love rewatching some movies again using the Apple TV 4K. Syncs up with that perfectly and sound, power etc all work great with Apple remote.
customer_reviews.author: nonaudiophiler

customer_reviews.title: Clear voices
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I have a problem with is CLEAR voices...Tried all types of settings but have a problem with always hearing muffled voices....Dennis
customer_reviews.author: Toomba

customer_reviews.title: "Refurbished"
customer_reviews.text: This "refurbished" item, it turns out, was sold to us with the ARC port not functioning: the ARC port which is principally the very reason TO get this very expensive top of the line item. The port being non-responsive was verified by an Amazon technician when he arrived to configure a different element in our A/V system.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Kulzer

customer_reviews.title: Really good for music but not so much for dialogue
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sound bar to go with my new Samsung QLED TV (which I LOVE, btw.) This sound bar sounded awesome in the store, where they have it hooked up to music, and it sounds awesome for music in my home as well. But what I DON'T like about it is the dialogue in movies and TV shows is not as clear as I had hoped it would be. I haven't been able to find any kind of setting for it. It is just "ok" for that. I wish I had bought one that was more highly rated for dialogue.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Dolby Atmos soundbar
customer_reviews.text: I have connected this Q90r soundbar to LG CX 65" TV using HDMI Arc connection, it works great , good quality sound , fast shipping very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Myazam

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Huge improvement since previous models. Surround is great, the sub is amazing. Adaptive mode worked very well. I have no complaints about this soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: Aa Ma

customer_reviews.title: Great! .... When it works
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it's great! Have so much difficulty connecting this to my Samsung Q70 and Q60 tvs. When it does connect via bluetooth or wifi, it often drops the connection. Now, there's a long lag when changing the volume. When I click volume up or down, it takes about 5-10 seconds to receive the signal. Tech support was zero help. Warranty is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: bdhor

customer_reviews.title: Older Samsungs might not work out.
customer_reviews.text: My "older" Samsung "smart" tv, keeps not recognizing the ARC soundbar, which sucks. Reboots help, but not what i need. Otherwise... wow. Great sound, everything i would want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Changed to soundbar from traditional 3.1 System do to space limitations at new home, this soundbar is easy to set up and operate. Great for music, high notes could be a little cleaner at higher volume. Overall very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Karsten

customer_reviews.title: Superior sound system
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow, I did months of research on YouTube, and everything led me back to Q90, since I already owned the Q90r Qled65, this seem to make sense, the way they made 4 pieces of speakers sound like you have 12 speakers, is truly amazing. And it can play all the current sound systems especially Dolby Atmos , which to me, puts in the movies. The sound is truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel & Alma Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive sound system but it does not live up to its price. I swapped out a Sony sound bar for this Samsung for the surround capability. Come to find out, the back speakers seldom play sound - maybe its the content I'm viewing. The huge subwoofer doesn't provide any more bass than the smaller one I had with my Sony. The only value add that I find usable is the wifi connectivity. I added the sound bar to my SmartThings and now have the ability to select it directly from Spotify with no need to turn on the sound bar when connecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, easy hookup, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to hookup. Out of box and linked to Bluetooth in 20 minutes. Sounds great. It works in unison with TV with the cable universal remote. Tip: Sound started fading in and out this past weekend. Had to delete the Bluetooth connection from TV and sound bar, turn both off, then back on, and reestablish the Bluetooth connection. Works fine again. Could not get it to work with Optical cable or HDMI. I have a 2017 75 series 65 inch Samsung TV. By the way sometimes it does not automatically sync with the TV and I have to sync them manually, but not often.
customer_reviews.author: NeverFinished

customer_reviews.title: Sound is incredible.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older bose cube with the 100 miles of stereo cable. the sound is amazing and the base is FAR better than the bose ever was. Using with a 82 inch Samsung tv so no need to hook to tv. Hooks up wirelessly. Wife is much happier without all the wires going everywhere. Happy wife, Happy life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Sounded good (for a Soundbar as compared to having AVR) but mine had an input changing issue (randomly changed inputs) so I returned it. My biggest issue with the sound though was the sound stage was not wide enough. Dialog was crystal clear though.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Overall look and size was perfect for my 65” Vizio. The only problems I had was getting the ARC and TV audio configuration setup to work properly. This was more of a Vizio tv problem. Audio Auto setting had to be set to work. A lot of bass for little size. Very happy with it now it works with my Dish and external devices
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Samsung sound bar
customer_reviews.text: connecting to a Samsung TV is probably easier than connecting to other brands. not sure just assuming. syncing sound bar controls to Xfinity remote does not include all controls such as bass, or sound types which are 3 settings. must use remote with sound bar to make these changes, so don't loose remote. I just set the sound on surround sound for all my programs. I also set base and forget it. Very good sound bar without separate rear speakers. Bought a second bar from Sam's as the price went up on Amazon. Basically you get what you pay for and this is a very good sound bar for the money.
customer_reviews.author: TL Slonaker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son are sound fanatics and they both LOVE this sound bar! Movies, concerts, streaming music have never sounded better! It is more money that we were planning on spending, but well worth it! Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Bought this soundbar last summer. Get no volume even when turned to 100. Sometimes have to turn on CC to understand movie. Went on line for help which appears to be non existant. Tried to use chat program for help, got none, keep getting shuffled down the road which is where my money went on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work Well with Samsung Smart TVs
customer_reviews.text: I needed a soundbar for my Samsung Smart TV. I matched brands because I thought I was cool. Both the TV and the soundbar have an "adaptive" sound mode; however, when they both have this setting on, the soundbar becomes an obnoxious white sound machine (emits loud static noise). Moreover, the soundbar and TV will randomly turn on in the middle of the night and begin playing that awful noise at quite a high volume. And to make matters even worse, both systems continually reset the sound mode setting to "adaptive", so I'm always needing to adjust the setting. But other than that, the product works as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great Clarity and Sound
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a LG OLED and it came with a sound bar. The problem was the lack of clarity when people were speaking. So we wanted to upgrade. Did much research and decided on this product. Pricey but certainly worth the money. I'm not an audio expert so for those that have various things they feel could be improved on in the product, I really didn't notice them once we started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R Ruggeri

customer_reviews.title: Small room with this but sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. I have a samsung tv and love how the remotes are the same. I havent done all the stuff I can do with it but love the sound quality and ease of use I just upgraded to a HW-Q70R and it is almost night and day with the Quality. Put the Q60R into my room and left the kick ass one in my living room. It's much more but the quality is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: P3ZZ

customer_reviews.title: Subwoofer broken
customer_reviews.text: From the box the subwoofer makes a popping noise randomly at certain frequencies. Item is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Audio drops intermittently for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Overall this soundbar sounds great when it isn’t cutting out at random times. I use it over Bluetooth with a Samsung 75” QLED TV and it will randomly just drop audio for a second. It is hugely annoying and if I’d known I would’ve never bought it. After research it appears this is a common issue Over Bluetooth and even wired connection and Samsung refuses to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Backwards Compatible
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound. Easy setup. 100% compatible with Q8 (2018) QLED TV.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn, NY

customer_reviews.title: No bass.
customer_reviews.text: For this price point there should be more and better base. Even at +6 on the sub I am not getting what I think I should have. Also I have an older Samsung TV and I can not get the TV remote to control the Sound Bar. I have a Logitech that takes care of the job. I listen to music about 5% of the time and this Sound Bar does not perform.
customer_reviews.author: Dal1wrd

customer_reviews.title: Deep bass... love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bose system in the family room and this compares very favorably to Bose. I set up this system in my home office and it thumps with sound bouncing from every angle. No question a great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ILikeAmazon

product_meta.title: Samsung Harman Kardon 3.1.2 Dolby Atmos Soundbar HW-Q70R with Wireless Subwoofer, Samsung Acoustic Beam Technology, Adaptive Sound, Game Mode, 4K Pass-Through with HDR, Bluetooth & Alexa Compatible
product_meta.description: Style:HW-Q70R SoundbarThe Samsung Harman Kardon 3. 1. 2 Dolby Atmos Soundbar HW-Q70R with Wireless Subwoofer transports you into every beautiful picture with Dolby Atmos and DTS: X technologies that let you hear and feel the drama unfold through three-dimensional sound from 7 built-in speakers that fire from in front and above. Combining 65 years of Samsung innovation with Harmon Kardon audio technical expertise, the 330-watt Q70R soundbar includes a wireless subwoofer that lets you feel the intensity of the action and the rhythm of the music with rich, powerful bass. Adaptive Sound technology automatically enhances voice clarity on low volumes, analyzing and automatically delivering optimized sound based on each scene. For gamers, Game Mode Pro offers a unique setting that boosts game sound effects for an immersive gaming experience. Home theater enthusiasts will appreciate the 4K pass-through option with HDR10 compatibility, allowing you to pass-through high definition audio with pristine quality matching that of your UHD HDR video. Connecting the wireless soundbar to your Samsung QLED TV is easy via Bluetooth, allowing you to eliminate the clutter of wires. The soundbar is wireless surround sound ready with the addition of an optional Wireless Surround Kit (sold separately) to expand your soundbar and subwoofer into a multi-channel home theater system. The Q70R includes smart features such as Alexa voice control compatibility and SmartThings connectivity for enhanced convenience.
feature_bullets: Product Dimensions: 43.3" W x 2.32" H x 3.93" D | Spk (sub woofer) Net Dimension: 8.07" W x 15.86" H x 15.86" D
Includes: Remote Control, Battery, Wall Mount Kit and HDMI Cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,288 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
